clinical_study.brief_title: Special Drug Use Investigation of Glucobay OD
clinical_study.official_title: Special Drug Use Investigation of Glucobay OD

oversight_info.authority: Japan: Ministry of Health, Labor and Welfare

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of this study is to assess the efficacy and safety under practical use of Glucobay OD. A total of 5,000 patients are to be enrolled to the study and assessed during 1 year observation period.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case-Only, Time Perspective: Prospective

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of adverse drug reactions (ADRs) and serious adverse events (SAEs)

arm_group.description: Patients treated with Glucobay OD under practical manner

intervention.description: Patients treated with Glucobay OD under practical manner

study_pop.textblock: Glucobay OD naive diabetics. Patients with at least one of the following conditions: Uncontrollable with dietary therapy,exercise cure, diabetes medication, insulin therapy.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Glucobay OD naive diabetics. patients with at least one of the following conditions: Uncontrollable with dietary therapy,exercise cure, diabetes medication, insulin therapy.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients who are contraindicated based on the product label
